author: damien
msg: Reorganized and commented the new replicator code for easier understanding.

author: rhuijben
msg: Cleanup svn_wc_status3_t and the code performing calculations
to fill it. The most important change is that restructuring changes
are now recorded in node_status instead of overlaying text_status.
(assemble_status): Simplify calculations by using a separate status
for restructuring changes to allow using text_status and prop_status
(svn_wc__is_sendable_status): Check node status for changes instead of
text_status and fill pristine_* with the info from text and property
status. Finally overlay the status with the conflict data, just
(print_status): Use combined status instead of text_status. Use node
(svn_cl__print_status): Simplify by using conflicted and node_status.

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-172: BaseRoles cannot be added or removed, they just comprise permissions that every user has
